description: Certified models meet all ENERGY STAR requirements as listed in the Version 5.0 ENERGY STAR Program Requirements for Residential Refrigerators and Freezers that are effective as of September 15, 2014. A detailed listing of key efficiency criteria are available at http://www.energystar.gov/index.cfm?c=refrig.pr_crit_refrigerators

name: ENERGY STAR Certified Residential Refrigerators
